subject: RE: [junit] TestCase Dependency Hierarchy
msgSnippet: ... tests ... tests ... It could go either way, it probably depends on the two things involved. I am asking for an easy way to chose that for myself on a
messageBody:
Kris wrote:

> If fruit is bad wouldn't you expect apple to be bad also? If apple
> succeeds and it uses fruit (which is bad) then succeeding apple
tests
> might point to a problem in apple. So it may be useful for apple
tests
> to run even though the fruit tests failed.

It could go either way, it probably depends on the two things involved. I am
asking for an easy way to chose that for myself on a testcase by testcase
basis.

regards

Adam


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
